comment.author: 92284803@N00
comment._content: Wife of Key Denson Pittman, Democrat senator from Nevada.

comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: She's the former Mimosa June Gates (1872-1952), married 1900, after she traveled by dogsled to Nome to be with him.  The couple left Alaska soon after they married, in part because her chronic lung complaint required a warmer climate.
